member.name: T:FarPoint.Localization.LocalizationResourceManager
member.summary: Provides convenient access to culture-specific resources at run time.

member.name: M:FarPoint.Localization.LocalizationResourceManager.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FarPoint.Localization.LocalizationResourceManager class that looks up resources in satellite assemblies based on information from the specified System.Type.
member.param: A System.Type from which the FarPoint.Localization.LocalizationResourceManager derives all information for finding .resources files.

member.name: M:FarPoint.Localization.LocalizationResourceManager.#ctor(System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FarPoint.Localization.LocalizationResourceManager class that looks up specified resources with the default language resources namespace inside satellite assemblies of the specified assembly. Note: This constructor use the information in the FarPoint.Localization.DefaultLanguageResourcesNameSpaceAttribute of the assembly to identify the rootname of resource file, so if the assembly don't have this attribute, this constructor would suppose that the resource file has empty namespace.
member.param: The resource file name (without its extension).
The main assembly for the resources.

member.summary: Get the default name space of languages resources file of the specified assembly from its DefaultLanguageResourcesNameSpace attribute
member.returns: The default name space of languages resources file

member.name: M:FarPoint.Localization.LocalizationResourceManager.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FarPoint.Localization.LocalizationResourceManager class that looks up specified resources in the default language resources path inside satellite assemblies of the specified assembly. Note: This constructor use the information in the FarPoint.Localization.DefaultLanguageResourcesPathAttribute of the assembly to identify the rootname of resource file, so if the assembly don't have this attribute, this constructor would cause a exception.

The resource file name (without its extension).
The main assembly for the resources.

member.name: T:FarPoint.Localization.DefaultLanguageResourcesNameSpaceAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the default fully qualified namespace of language resources files inside the attributed assembly. This attribute is using by FarPoint.Win.Location.LocatizationResourceManager object to identify the root name of the resource file with specified file name inside specified assembly.

member.param: The default fully qualified namespace name of language resources files.
